thread.title_full: War hier zwei mal, insgesamt 15 N채chte. Warmer Service und Gutes Essen - Review of Red Wall Garden Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Barry G
title: War hier zwei mal, insgesamt 15 N채chte. Warmer Service und Gutes Essen
text:
Was here several times during our visit to Beijing, this unique Hotel!
No luxury and glamour, if you are looking for. But warm service, fine food and cosy,
spacy rooms!! Very quiet and comfortable bed, is that not what we all need for a stay?
Will be back in April!
Room Tip: Hotel Personal anfragen und eigener Anliegen erw채hnen See more room tips
